entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the evening then southwest 60 gusting to 80 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
